title: Resident Evil 3's Nemesis Just Got Scarier - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.06.20
description:
Blessing and Imran discuss a new feature for Resident Evil 3's nemesis along with news of Iam8Bit pulling out of E3.

Time Stamps -
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
We’re hosting and producing a debut stream for the game CORE. On Thursday, March 19th at 3 p.m. PT, you can tune in to twitch.tv/kindafunnygames to see the devs from Manticore Games join Greg as they build multiplayer games live in CORE!
The Roper Report   -
00:07:21 - Resident Evil 3’s Nemesis Just Got a Whole Lot Scarier
00:10:54 - “Does this make the game too difficult?” - Lee Pollero
00:15:17 - Iam8bit resigns as E3 2020 creative director
00:18:18 - “Do you think they were fired or quit?” - Midnight Owl
00:26:25 - Frictional Games Reveals Their Horror Sequel
00:33:35 - TurboGrafx-16 Mini delayed after coronavirus shuts down production
00:36:26 - Psyonix cancels Rocket League World Championship
00:37:17 - Take-Two CEO says COVID-19 could spark long-term change in remote work
00:39:57 - Bungie activates remote work policy
00:42:16 - Out today
00:44:03 -  “Ad”  
 Reader mail   -
00:44:37 - “Let's have a little gander of what the unannounced Project Lockhart might be…” - Robby Rob
00:52:19 - “A recent report suggests that one of the reasons google stadia may be struggling to attract some of the major indie titles is a lack of realistic financial deals being offered to devs…” - A Qwerk of Fate
00:55:25 - Squad Up: Zack - Xbox One - SONofTHOMP8264
00:56:41 - You‘re Wrong
01:03:32 - Post Show
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Greg & Tim
Tuesday - Blessing & Imran
Wednesday - Greg & Whitta
Thursday - Greg & Blessing
Friday - Greg & Blessing
